name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Looks reliable and ready to go! Thanks for representing #TeamShapiro, Blake! 🚙  Get your own:  https://t.co/KEtrjpA32q

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Extremists in Harrisburg continue to peddle the Big Lie with their false narrative of widespread voter fraud — and their sham "audit."  They're playing a dangerous game based on lies, but I'm taking them to court to fight for truth.  https://t.co/5sECBNcOFd

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: This is an all hands on deck moment.   Our first public fundraising deadline is two days from now, and we've got to close our end of year gap.   If you're able, chip in $10 to our campaign to help us do it:  https://t.co/K3NI1aPxvL

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Pennsylvania’s future is bright — but we'll only get there if we reach for it together.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: 75% of Pennsylvania counties have now signed on to receive $1 billion in funds from the pharma companies who manufactured the opioid epidemic.  This money will go to treatment, recovery, and supporting families whose loved ones are suffering right now.   It will save lives.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: I’m Attorney General Josh Shapiro, and I’m running for Governor of Pennsylvania.  I believe in protecting the right to choose, defending democracy, and equality for all.  If you’re with me, RT and follow. We have a long road ahead, and we need everyone on board.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: If you believe in a woman's right to choose, equal protections under the law for our LGBTQ+ community, and defending our democracy — then you believe in our fight.  Show it off — and use HELLO2022 for 20% off any item in our store:  https://t.co/KEtrjpA32q

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Republicans in Harrisburg subpoenaed the Social Security and driver's license numbers of 9 million Pennsylvanians to fuel their sham "audit."  This is a dangerous violation of our right to privacy — so I took them to court.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: I've secured $1 billion in a historic settlement to support our fight against the opioid crisis and help our loved ones recover.  We need these dollars to get folks the treatment resources they need. It will save lives.    https://t.co/bK3ELicYl9

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Nothing is more important than protecting our kids.  That's why we launched Safe2Say Something — a violence prevention program that offers students a way to anonymously report tips about dangerous behavior.  https://t.co/l5VqxxsziR

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Every Pennsylvanian has a place in this campaign. We can't do this without you.  If you're in this fight for the future of our democracy, join us:  https://t.co/K3NI1aPxvL

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: As Governor, I'll fight for your family as though they're my own.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: 🚨 SALE ALERT! 🚨  Use HELLO2022 for 20% off every item in our store — and get ready for the year ahead.   https://t.co/KEtrjpA32q  https://t.co/7xikyQAndq

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: New York and New Jersey are on track to raise their minimum wage by the end of 2022.  We should be right there with them. It's time to #RaiseTheWage in Pennsylvania.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: If you enjoyed your holiday, thank a union.   If you had a good weekend, thank a union.   Thank a union — and then join our fight to protect them.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Wishing a peaceful and joyful Kwanzaa to every Pennsylvanian celebrating over the next seven days!

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: To the first responders, service members, police officers, and health care workers working this Christmas and away from their families: Thank you for everything you do.  You’ve made our holiday season possible in Pennsylvania.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Merry Christmas, Pennsylvania!  https://t.co/lvZg1UpE4R

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Unlike Santa Claus, I can’t promise you presents and flying reindeer, but I can promise you this:   As Governor, I’m going to fight everyday to ensure that your family can afford to pay their bills, has accessible health care, and your kids receive a great education.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Before the Sixers tip off tonight…. just bumping this.  @MarcZumoff and I are here if you need us, guys. Go get ’em.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: There’s sure to be plenty feats of strength and airing of grievances over the next year… so for today, wishing you a very happy #Festivus for the rest of us.   May your grievances be few!  https://t.co/0Ve1qg80j8

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: That’s why we’ll be asking for your help — to knock doors, make calls, and post online. It’s going to be your work that makes the difference.  We’ve got a lot of work ahead of us — so rest up, and let’s win this.  https://t.co/BDQHhA6AsT

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: This is going to be one of the closest races in the country — and one of the most important.  It’s no exaggeration to say the fight to protect democracy in this country could hinge on our success or failure in this campaign here in Pennsylvania.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: That means each of us has a responsibility to get off the sidelines. To get in the game.  As we all prepare to celebrate the holidays, spend time with family, or simply recharge, I want to say thank you.  By being a member of our campaign community, you’ve gotten in the game.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: We started this campaign just over two months ago with a hometown rally in Abington, a PA-wide bus tour, and a passage from scripture I’ve looked to for guidance my whole life:  “None of us are required to complete the task — but neither are we free to refrain from it.”  🧵

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: When Caroline and the Collegeville Italian Bakery team saw their community needed a helping hand this holiday season, they stepped up — & organized a very merry toy-drive.  Grateful to have had the opportunity to visit them, grab some amazing food — and thank them for their work!  https://t.co/cept2Vqf9O

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: I'm going to fight like hell to pass a non-discrimination law in Pennsylvania.   Our LGBTQ+ community deserves equal protections under the law.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: A Republican Governor would not hesitate to implement a Texas-style, early-term abortion ban in Pennsylvania if given the chance.  I'd veto it.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: This race is going to be one of the most competitive in the nation, but we can win this — so long as everybody steps off the sidelines, and gets in the game.  We need you standing with us.  https://t.co/K3NI1aPxvL

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: @RexChapman @marczumoff Huge compliment from one of the greatest shooters of all time. Means a lot from you, @RexChapman!

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: It’s time to get off the sidelines — and Zoo and I need you on this team. Help us hit our End of Year goal:  https://t.co/K3NI1aPxvL

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: As your Governor, I’ll always work to turn *garbage into gold* and put points on the board for Pennsylvanians.   @MarcZumoff, I’m ready to get in the game.  https://t.co/e2x3xN0jwB

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: https://t.co/BPG1PM6EvI

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: In 2020, Westmoreland County lost 91 loved ones to the opioid epidemic. Those were folks with families who cared for them.  Big Pharma fueled this crisis for profit, and I took action to make them pay. Together, we're going make recovery more accessible for every Pennsylvanian.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Extremist Republicans will continue their efforts to restrict access to the ballot box, because it’s the only way they’ll stay in power.  They know it, we know it, and we’re fighting back.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: New York and New Jersey have legalized recreational marijuana while Pennsylvania lags behind.   It's time to join our neighbors and get it done.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Today is the #WinterSolstice – the darkest day of the year – and I know too many families across the Commonwealth are struggling to deal with rising energy and heating bills this year.  As Governor, I’m going to fight like hell to reign in costs in Pennsylvania.

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Trump and his allies sued us dozens of times to undermine the 2020 election — but we won.  Now they’re trying to make it harder for Pennsylvanians to cast their ballot — and I'm in court again, defending our democracy.  We’ve got to win.  https://t.co/uaR10SiKr5

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: https://t.co/bJgwO2L4i4

name: Josh Shapiro
tweet: Big Pharma manufactured the opioid epidemic that claimed 74 lives in Chester County as of the end of November, and thousands across PA.  I fought back, and with this settlement — we’re bringing millions to support our communities in combating this crisis. We can’t afford to wait.
